climbs.name: La Dévoreuse
climbs.fa: Jean-Simon Grenier, Jérôme St-Michel & Serge Alexandre Demers Giroux (September 21, 2016)

content.description:
I have not been climbing for many years, but I can tell you guys that this splitter will make glad you came all the way to Pourvoirie Domaine Bazinet. I will even say that this is the coolest laser cut splitter I have seen north of Montréal. 
  
 No access as been negotiated with the owners so if you wanna go there you need to contact the information center. Contact information is available from their website: 
  
 www.domainebazinet.com

I don't have the exact coordinates, but once you are inside the pouvoirie you can see the cliff on your left. As soon as you reach the cliff, follow it and you can't miss the line.
to Camalot 0.75

A good route that goes from hand to fist to offwidth.

The crack left to La Devoreuse
to Camalot #5

Climbing access presently under negotiations 
  
 Please refrain from climbing here until an agreement is reached. 
 Svp ne pas grimper à ce site tant que l' accès n'y soit approuvé.
